setting: A far-future universe where humanity has colonized dozens of star systems.

lore.title: The First Contact War
lore.summary: Humanity's disastrous first encounter with the alien Xenovek species, leading to decades of tension and cold war.

historyLog.description: The player's transport ship docked at Axiom Research Station.
Station security protocols activated a lockdown after detecting a security breach.

notes: The Orion Sector is experiencing increased Xenovek activity, with reports of their scout ships near human colony worlds.
